        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response post(es.unex.giiis.pi.rednotes.model.Reminder newReminder,
                                                                                 @Context
                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method, it's called when the logged user want to created a new reminder to a note, in a specific date. Can not there are two reminders for the same note in the same date The 'idu' must be the idu of the logged user IDN, IDU and DATE can not be empty.
